snippet.title: Millikan's Reach Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Millikan's Reach is out NOW in an Early Access state on Google Play and on itch.io!

Itch.io: https://inferiorplanet.itch.io/millikans-reach
Google Play (Pending Approval): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.InferiorPlanet.MillikansReach

Set in a war-torn star system on the fringes of civilized space, Millikan's Reach is a single-player open-world space shooter with trading and mining elements - built in the image of classics in the genre. A clean art style, fluid spaceflight and an easy-to-learn economy ensure an experience you can quickly pick up and play, without compromising the freedom that the best in the genre has to offer.

Learn more or join the community:
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MillikansReach/
Discord: https://discord.gg/CtZgMTS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MillikansReach
